column5: BRUSSELS  Sept 21 The EU's antitrust chief said on Friday European regulators had not yet taken any decision on whether to object to a 5.2 billion euro ($6.7 billion) bid by United Parcel Service for Dutch rival TNT Express .

column4: Judge allows Walmart discrimination case to proceed  for now
column5: SAN FRANCISCO A U.S. judge rejected Walmart's  request to dismiss a gender discrimination case filed in California  but said he would rule later about whether the plaintiffs had enough evidence to be certified as a class.

column4: Judge allows Walmart discrimination case to proceed  for now

column4: Walmart to hire more than 50 000 for U.S. holiday rush
column5: Wal-Mart Stores Inc plans to hire more than 50 000 seasonal employees to work at its Walmart stores in the United States  slightly more than it did last year  as it gets ready for the winter holiday season  its busiest time of year.

column4: UPDATE 1-Walmart to hire more than 50 000 for U.S. holiday rush
column5: Sept 21 Wal-Mart Stores Inc plans to hire more than 50 000 seasonal employees to work at its Walmart stores in the United States  slightly more than it did last year  as it gets ready for the winter holiday season  its busiest time of year.

column4: Wal-Mart to hire more than 50 000 for holiday rush
column5: Sept 21 Wal-Mart Stores Inc said on Friday that it plans to give current workers the chance to work more hours and will hire more than 50 000 seasonal employees as it gets ready for the winter holiday season  its busiest time of year.

column4: Crew diver drowns on set of new "Lone Ranger" movie
column5: LOS ANGELES  Sept 21 A diver working on the set of Johnny Depp's new Western movie "The Lone Ranger" drowned on Friday while cleaning out a tank  police and movie studio Walt Disney Co said.

column4: UPDATE 1-Swiss probe oil company Weatherford share deals
column5: ZURICH  Sept 21 The Swiss SIX exchange said on Friday it was investigating executive share transactions at Weatherford   one of the world's largest oilfield services companies  for possible breaches of disclosure rules.
